typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Plant as string,
		AverageTemperature as string,
		AverageHumidity as string,
		TemperatureDescription as string,
		ProcessedTime as string,
		PlantType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSensorMessagesBlob
